column1: The Pit Room////One of the underplayed stars in the Pit show are the sides.  The okra (when it's not seasoned too heavily) is outstanding.  We love the beans and mac & cheese as well (mac can be mushy
column2: but that's par for the course most places).  Don't forget to order the jalapeno sausage either
column3: it can count as an appetizer for the daring.
